page.title: 07A day in the life of Jamie
page.content: I wake at 7.00 and have a shower. Then I make a cup of tea and watch 'He-Man' on T.V. After a breakfast of cornflakes I leave for school at 8.45. I wait in the yard for the bell to ring, then register in my form room. Lessons are 35 minutes long and a typical day might be Maths, English, Science, Geography, and in the after- noon 2 'doubles', Woodwork and French. 'Break' is from 10.30 _ 10.45. I go into the yard or to the school shop. Lunchtime is from 12.00 _ 1.15 when I go home and have a pizza and a cup of coffee with my parents. I do my home- work and leave for school at 1 p.m. After school I do my homework until 4.30 when I watch T.V. My mother gets home at 6.00 and then we have tea. My father and I then go to the video shop to hire two cassettes which we watch until I go to bed at 11.40.
